full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSGOS TZAS SANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,'ON KYANG GANG BGYIS KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
